name: True Horror
description:
True Horror is a choose your path horror audio game. The stories are told by narration and emphasised with voice acting and cinematic effects.

The stories are derived from real life true horror tales. the game takes you front seat in the journey with your choices determine if you live or die!

with your purchase of the app you get the whole game with 10 choose your own path horror stories. plus with No advertising either!

thankyou for supporting lets read!
